news.title: Israeli forces besiege Gaza hospital as Hamas offers truce terms
news.summary: Israel has laid out conditions which could bring about the end of the war.

news.title: Two dead as Mexican Navy ship crashes into Brooklyn Bridge
news.summary: At least 19 people were also injured after masts of training sail vessel hit New York City bridge.

news.title: Minister 'pushing' for deal over use of EU passport e-gates
news.summary: The deal could form part of negotiations taking place between the UK and EU on Monday.

news.title: Russia launched war's largest drone attack ahead of Putin-Trump call, Ukraine says
news.summary: The barrage comes ahead of a planned call between Presidents Trump and Putin on Monday, as the US pushes for a ceasefire.

news.title: Remember Monday singer says she's lost wedding ring after Eurovision
news.summary: Singer Holly-Anne Hull revealed the loss in a video shared from a plane the morning after the contest.

news.title: Pope meets Zelensky after inauguration Mass
news.summary: In a private meeting, the Ukrainian leader thanked the pontiff for being a 'clear voice' defending peace.

news.title: Teenager dies after disturbance at beach in Scotland
news.summary: Kayden Moy, 16, was seriously injured on the North Ayrshire beach on Saturday and died in hospital on Sunday.

news.title: Mission: Impossible returns, and Nine Perfect Strangers: What's coming up this week
news.summary: BBC drama The Bombing of Pan Am 103 is also released, and Peter Andre's film Jafaican is coming out.

news.title: FBI says suspect in US fertility clinic blast had 'nihilistic ideations'
news.summary: Investigators say they believe the 25-year-old suspect was killed in the explosion.

news.title: Former Little Mix singer Jesy Nelson gives birth to twins
news.summary: The former Little Mix singer says the two girls are "healthy and fighting strong" after being born prematurely

news.title: 'What the Hell Just Happened' to the UK Eurovision entry?
news.summary: Remember Monday had high hopes, but their Eurovision entry ended in 19th place. What went wrong?

news.title: Why this year's strawberries are set to be sweeter
news.summary: Growers say they are seeing bigger, sweeter berries due to recent warm days and cool nights.

news.title: 'The old place will live on - but this was end of an era for Goodison Park'
news.summary: The blue smoke could be seen rising around Goodison Park almost four hours before kick-off. This grand old arena was not built for serene farewells, so a day of history and high emotion was never going to pass off quietly.

news.title: Relief in Kashmir - but BBC hears from families on both sides mourning the dead
news.summary: The BBC visits families in Kashmir devastated by the deadliest clashes in years, and speaks to military insiders.

news.title: Ros Atkins on... Trump's deals in the Gulf
news.summary: The BBC's Analysis Editor Ros Atkins examines President Trump's trip to the Gulf.
